item.title: CVE-2022-42966|2024-08-03T13:19:05.526Z -- cleo -- cleo
item.description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the cleo PyPI package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the Table.set_rows method
